resources.string: Choose a way to pilot Ollie

Our app allows you to pilot your favorite robot in two different way: Joystick mode and Pad mode. When the robot is connected and the mode is selected, place ollie on the ground on the direction of your choice, then click the calibrate button.

The app connects to the robot via bluetooth. You just need to click on the bluetooth button and have the robot near you. When the robot gets blue, the connexion succeed. To access the joystick and the pad, you must be conncted.
Pilots your ollie via the joystick.
Pilots your ollie via the pad. Draw the path on the screen and the robot will follow it. The change the distances, play with the slider value.
